text: “apage paramadhipatiyaneni! apava aparadhakara janaya vesena mema nagarayen pita karanu mænava! tavada apata oba vetin bharakaruvaku pat karanu mænava! tavada apata oba vetin udavkaruvaku pat karanu mænava!“ yæyi pavasana pirimingen vu dubalayin da kantavan da daruvan da (asarana va) sitiya di, allahge margaye numbala satan novæda sitimata numbalata kumak vi da
